author: wsmoak
msg: [9272] Add .wxs file and configuration for the multi-module project in IT003.  The example uses relative paths in the .wxs file, which will only work in a recursive build.  It also demonstrates the need to be able to configure the output directory for both candle and light.

author: wsmoak
msg: [10557] NPanday does not work with -Dmaven.repo.local, so comment out the Invoker Plugin's localRepositoryPath configuration until this is fixed.  Integration tests will use the normal local repo for now.
